wet:
(:action wet_window
    :parameters (?p - person ?w - window ?b - bucket ?water - water ?soap - soap)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?w) (in ?water ?b) (in ?soap ?b) (holding ?p ?b))
    :effect (and (wet ?w) (clean ?w))
)
```

#### Action 2: Position Razor Blade
```pddl
position:
(:action position_razor_blade
    :parameters (?p - person ?w - window ?r - razor_blade)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?w) (holding ?p ?r) (sharp ?r))
    :effect (and (in_contact ?r ?w))
)
```

#### Action 3: Scrape Paint
```pddl
(:action scrape_paint
    :parameters (?p - person ?w - window ?r - razor_blade ?paint - paint_splatters)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?w) (in_contact ?r ?w) (sharp ?r) (on ?paint ?w))
    :effect (and (removed ?paint ?w) (duller ?r) (dirty ?r))
)
```

#### Action 4: Clean Window with Glass Cleaner
```pddl
clean:
(:action clean_window_with_glass_cleaner
    :parameters (?p - person ?w - window ?gc - glass_cleaner ?c - cloth)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?w) (holding ?p ?gc) (holding ?p ?c))
    :effect (and (clean ?w) (spritzed ?w ?gc) (buffed ?w ?c))
)
```

#### Action 5: Remove Small Paint Splatters
```pddl

(:action remove_small_paint_splatters
    :parameters (?p - person ?w - window ?cs - chemical_solvent ?paint - paint_splatters)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?w) (holding ?p ?cs) (on ?paint ?w))
    :effect (and (removed ?paint ?w) (used ?cs))
)
```

These actions capture the steps and their descriptions, reflecting the necessary conditions and effects based on the entity states provided.
